channel.title: How could i add a interface for new players *Solved*
channel.description:
i managed to solve this problem by creating my own interface image.
Thanks for the help ;)

item.title: How could i add a interface for new players *Solved*
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Can’t help any more than that. You could always design one yourself…

Perfect idea i will design one myself and use that tut cheers bud.

item.title: How could i add a interface for new players *Solved*
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:541537”][quote author=haviland4 link=topic=660408.msg4415762#msg4415762 date=1395831565]
i did just try search via google but cant find any of the ones i want…

just a simple interface so you can choose your starter gear.
[/quote]
does 5 minute google search (At most 5 minutes)
Note: I did not try the dl links…
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/341356-unique-starter-interface-pi-renamed.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/371998-starter-interface-release.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/429398-custom-starter-interface.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/301808-old-login-interface.html[/quote]

The first link is perfect for me but i wish the download worked none of them do… :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: How could i add a interface for new players *Solved*
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:3, topic:541537”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=660408.msg4415696#msg4415696 date=1395793933]
When they first login just do
c.getPA().sendInterface(someinterfaceID);
and then you can just code a starter screen or fine one of the many released.
[/quote]

do you know a tut for this??? or what file do i go into???[/quote]
Have you even considered google? I swear you post every single question you possibly have before even thinking to look it up.
This is, in my opinion, one of the easiest, most basic things to do, it’s also one of the first things like 95% of people I see who take up a RSPS change.

Seriously. Go google how to add a welcome screen to a PI. You’ll get plenty of results.

Also, you have a lot of posts recently that haven’t been “solved”. You should lay back on them and work on one problem at a time, it is less stressful and helps you think

Read full topic
